title: Lightning Talks
summary:
Lightning Talks are fun, short, five-minute (or less) talks. Ideally
each talk should make a single point, often in a fun, quirky or
over-the-top way.
description:
1. Launch to Borderline Zombie in a Year by Mike Jones

2. Why you're dumb if you are doing a Python GUI in anything other than
   Kivy by Richard Larkin

3. PyPy by Adam Jorgensen (slides)

4. Sonic Pi by Simon de Haan

5. The challenge of mathematical formula markup for African feature
   phones by Jonathan Endersby
